property.name: Text
property.value: Put on Planes only. When the upgraded character attacks or defends -> Look at the top card of your deck. You may scrap it.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this is on Bumblebee and he attacks -> Draw a card.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you put this on a Ranged Character -> Do 1 damage to each enemy.

property.name: Text
property.value: Each of your characters gets +1 [ATK] until end of turn for each Upgrade on it.

property.name: Text
property.value: After the upgraded character defends -> Scrap this card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Put on Melee characters only. Tough 3.

property.name: Text
property.value: Choose an enemy character. Move 1 damage counter from each of your Planes to that enemy.

property.name: Text
property.value: You may play an Action. Then you may play another Action.

property.name: Text
property.value: Put on Insecticons only. When the upgraded character is KO'd -> Draw a card, scrap an enemy Upgrade, and your opponent chooses a card from their hand and scraps it.

property.name: Text
property.value: Put on Trucks only. The upgraded character has +1 [ATK] for each Cargo Trailer on it. Up to 3 Cargo Trailers can fit in its Utility slot.

property.name: Text
property.value: Each player chooses a Weapon on one of their characters and scraps it. Each player chooses a card in their hand and scraps it

property.name: Text
property.value: While the upgraded character has a Weapon -> It has Bold 1. While the upgraded character has an Armor -> It has Tough 1.

property.name: Text
property.value: Your opponent chooses 3 cards from their hand and scraps the rest.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you put this on a character -> Scrap an enemy Utility. If you can't, draw a card. Pierce 1.

property.name: Text
property.value: Put on Tanks only. The upgraded character has Pierce equal to its armor.

property.name: Text
property.value: When the upgraded character attack and you flip an equal number of [O] and [B] -> Each of those [B] adds to its attack total.

property.name: Text
property.value: At the start of your turn -> Draw a card.

property.name: Text
property.value: When the upgraded character attacks -> Draw a card. Then you may put a card from your hand on top of your deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: When the upgraded character attacks -> Return one of the defending character's Upgrades to its owner's hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: Scrap your hand. One of your Dinobots gets Bold 5 until end of turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: Return all Upgrades on a character to their owner's hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: Look at your opponent's hand and scrap an Upgrade from it.

property.name: Text
property.value: Look at your opponent's hand and scrap an Action from it.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you put this on a character -> Scrap an enemy Armor. If you can't, draw a card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Repair 1 damage from one of your characters. If you have more [STAR] of characters in your KO area than you have on the battlefield, repair 2 more damage from that character.

property.name: Text
property.value: Put on damaged characters only. Pierce 3.

property.name: Text
property.value: Draw a card for each of your Upgrades.

property.name: Text
property.value: If the upgraded character would take 5 or more attack damage -> Instead scrap this card andthe upgraded character takes 4 damage.

property.name: Text
property.value: While this is on Megatron -> He has Pierce 3.

property.name: Text
property.value: After the upgraded character attacks -> Scrap this card.

property.name: Text
property.value: If any of your other characters would take attack damage -> Instead the upgraded character takes that damage.

property.name: Text
property.value: Flip each of your characters from bot mode to Tank mode. Then, for each of your Tanks that isn't upgraded with an Amor, put an Armor on it from your scape pile.

property.name: Text
property.value: Return one of your KO'd characters that has 12 [STAR] or fewer to the battlefield and repair 1 damage from it. At the end of turn, KO it.

property.name: Text
property.value: Draw 2 cards. Then put a card from your hand on top of your deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: Draw 3 cards. Then scrap 2 cards from your hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: One of your characters gets +3 Attack until end of turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: Put on Autobots only. While this is on a Leader -> Each of your other characters has +1 [ATK] and Pierce 1.

property.name: Text
property.value: Repair 2 damage from one of your characters.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you put this on a Specialist -> You may play an Action.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you put this on a Specialist -> You may play an Upgrade.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this is on Starscream -> He has Bold 2.

card.name: One Shall Stand, One Shall Fall

property.name: Text
property.value: Choose one of your characters and an enemy character. Do 3 damage to each of them.

property.name: Text
property.value: You may KO one of your characters that has 6 [STAR] or more. If you do, take an extra turn after this one.

property.name: Text
property.value: Put on Melee characters only. Bold 3.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you put this on a Ranged character -> Your opponent chooses a card from their hand and scraps it.

property.name: Text
property.value: Flip one of your characters to its other mode.

property.name: Text
property.value: Untap one of your characters that has 10 [STAR] or fewer.

property.name: Text
property.value: Repair 1 damage from each of your characters.

property.name: Text
property.value: Flip each of your characters from bot mode to alt mode.

property.name: Text
property.value: Scrap ALL Upgrades. Repair 1 damage from each character for each Upgrade scrapped from it.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you put this on a character -> Scrap an enemy Weapon. If you can't, draw a card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Each player reveals their hands and scraps all upgrades from it.

property.name: Text
property.value: When the upgraded character defends and you flip an equal number of [B] and [O] -> Each of those [O] adds to its Armor total.

property.name: Text
property.value: Flip each of your characters from bot mode to Car mode. Then untap one of your Cars.

property.name: Text
property.value: When the upgraded character is NOT Ironhide and it attacks -> Do 2 damage to it.

property.name: Text
property.value: One of your characters gets Bold 3 until end of turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: Untap one of your tapped characters. Then tap one of your untapped characters.

property.name: Text
property.value: Choose 2 of your characters. Swap all of their Upgrades.

property.name: Text
property.value: Flip a battle card for each Insecticon you behand the game with. For each [O] you flip, your opponent chooses one of their characters and deals 1 damage to it. For each [B] you flip, repair 1 damage from one of your characters.

property.name: Text
property.value: Each player scraps their hand and draws 4 cards.

property.name: Text
property.value: Choose one of your characters. If it is a truck, repair 2 damage from it. If it is a car, draw 2 cards.

property.name: Text
property.value: One of your characters get +2 [ATK] until end of turn. While it's attacking an enemy that has more stars than it, it gets Pierce 4.

property.name: Text
property.value: When the upgraded character is attacking -> It has Pierce 1 that attack for each blue battle icon you flip.

property.name: Text
property.value: Scrap the top 4 cards of your deck. Put all Upgrades scrapped this way into your hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: Put on Cars only. When you put this on a character -> Untap that character.

property.name: Text
property.value: Each of your untapped Transformers can attack this turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you play this from your hand -> You may play Tandem Targeting System from your scrap pile.

property.name: Text
property.value: One of your Titans gets Bold 4 until end of turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: If the upgraded character would take damage -> Instead your Metroplex takes that damage.

property.name: Text
property.value: If you have Metroplex on the battlefield -> Draw a card for each character you have on the battlefield.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you flip to this mode -> Repair 1 damage from each of your characters.

property.name: Text
property.value: This has Pierce equal to her [ATK]

property.name: Text
property.value: When you flip to this mode -> Scrap all cards from your hand. Then draw that many cards.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you reshuffle your deck while this is attacking -> KO the defender if it has 12 Stars or fewer.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you flip to this mode -> You may scrap a card from your hand that has at least [W]. If you do, draw 2 cards.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this attacks or defends and you flip your first [W] this turn -> This gets +1 [ATK] and +1 [DEF] until end of turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this defends against an enemy that doesn't have Pierce and you flip at least [W] [W] -> This can't take more than 2 damage this attack.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this attacks and you flip at least [W] [W] -> This gets Pierce 2 until after the attack.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you flip to this mode -> You may play an Action.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this attacks for the first time each turn and you flip at least [W] [W] [W] -> Untap this.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you flip to this mode -> One of your characters gets Pierce 2 until end of turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: While this is attacking a damaged enemy -> This has Bold 2.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you flip to this mode -> Draw a card. Then put a card from your hand on top of your deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this attacks or defends and you flip at least [W] [W] -> Flip 2 more battle cards.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you flip to this mode -> This character can attack untapped enemies this turn as though they were untapped.

property.name: Text
property.value: While this is your only character on the battlefield -> He has +2 [ATK] and +2 [DEF].

property.name: Text
property.value: When you flip to this mode -> Scrap all Upgrades from this character. For each one scrapped this way, draw a card and repair 1 damage from each of your Insecticons.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this attacks -> You may move an Upgrade from one of your other characters to this one.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you flip to this mode -> Return a card that has at least [W] from your scrap pile to hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this attacks and you flip at least [W] [W] -> Draw 2 cards.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you flip to this mode -> You may scrap a card from your hand. If you do, do 2 damage to an enemy.

property.name: Text
property.value: While this is defending against Ranged characters -> This has +2 [DEF].

property.name: Text
property.value: When you flip to this mode -> Choose and enemy. If its KO'd this turn, draw 2 cards.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you flip to this mode -> Each player draws 2 cards.

property.name: Text
property.value: When a card is scrapped from your opponent's hand -> Your opponent chooses one of their characters and does 1 damage to it.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you flip to this mode -> Draw a card for each of your other Tanks.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this is attacking -> Flip extra Battle Cards equal to his Armor.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you flip to this mode -> Move any number of damage counters from your other Dinobots to this one.

property.name: Text
property.value: When one of your Dinobots attacks -> Repair 1 damage from it.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you flip to this mode and you have no cards in hand -> Draw 2 cards.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this attacks -> You may put a card from your hand on top of your deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you flip to this mode -> Move 1 damage counter from this character to an enemy.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you flip to this mode -> Each of your characters has Bold 1 until end of turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: Each of your characters has Tough 1.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you flip to this mode -> One of your Dinobots gets Bold 3 until end of turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this does more than enough attack damage to KO an enemy -> Your opponent chooses one of their other characters and puts the extra damage on it.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you flip to this mode -> Return all upgrades on a character to their owner's hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you flip to this mode -> You may KO one of your Insecticons. If you do, tap an enemy that has 13 Stars or fewer.

property.name: Text
property.value: This can't take more than 3 attack damage from a single attack.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you flip to this mode -> Put an Armor or Utility from your scrap pile onto this character.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this damages an enemy -> Repair 1 damage from one of your Insecticons.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this is attacking, flip 2 more battle cards for each other Insecticon you began the game with.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you flip to this mode -> You may scrap a card from your hand. If you do, scrap an enemy Upgrade.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you flip to this mode -> Return a Weapon from your scrap pile to hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: This can be upgraded with a Weapon in his Armor and/or Utility slots.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you flip to this mode -> Your opponent chooses one of their characters and does 2 damage to it.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you reshuffle your scrap pile into your deck -> Put the bottom card of your deck face down under this. This has +3 [ATK] for each card under him.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you flip to this mode -> Return an Action from your scrap pile to hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: After you flip battle cards for this character's attack and before defense flips -> You may play one of the Actions you flipped.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you flip to this mode -> Repair 1 damage from each of your Autobots.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you flip to this mode -> Each of your Cars gets Bold 2 until end of turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: When one of your Cars is KO'd -> Repair 3 damage from one of your other characters.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you flip to this mode -> Move 2 damage counters from another character to this one.

property.name: Text
property.value: This character's Power is equal to the number of damage counters on him.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you flip to this mode -> Each player reveals the top card of their deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this defends and you flip at least [W] -> You may choose one of your other characters. If you do, damage from this attack is done to that character instead.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you flip to this mode -> Do damage to an enemy equal to the number of other Planes you have.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you flip to this mode and you have fewer than 3 cards in hand -> Draw cards equal to the difference.

property.name: Text
property.value: This character's [ATK] is equal to the number of cards you have in hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you flip to this mode -> Do 2 damage to a Melee enemy.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you play an Action, this gets +1 [ATK] until end of turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you upgrade one of your Cars -> Draw a card. Then scrap a card from your hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: While you have a Weapon in your scrap pile -> This has Bold 3.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you flip to this mode -> Each of your characters has Pierce 1 until end of turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you flip to this mode -> Draw a card.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you flip one of your other Cars to Bot Mode -> Draw a card.

property.name: Text
property.value: This has +1 [ATK] for each Car in your KO area.

property.name: Text
property.value: When one of your Planes attacks -> Move 1 damage from it to the defender.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this attacks and you flip at least 3 different Battle Icons -> This gets +3 [ATK] until end of turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: This begins the game with these 3 characters under it -> Scamper, City Patrol, Six-Gun, Heavy Weapons Expert, Slammer, Combat Drone. When you flip to this mode -> Deploy a character from under this to the battlefield.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this attacks and you flip at least [W][W][O][O][B][B] -> Tap each enemy and do 1 damage to each enemy.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you flip to this mode and have Metroplex on the battlefield -> Scrap an enemy Weapon or Armor.

property.name: Text
property.value: When your Metroplex attacks -> Do 1 damage to the defender.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you flip to this mode -> your Metroplex gets Bold 2 until end of turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you deploy this from under Metroplex -> Do 1 damage to each enemy. Your Metroplex has Bold 1.
